english.segment1: Thought you saw this last time. It's a rerun. But this time it's changed you. You said you never watched it. It's your free time
english.segment2: Image past. Forget your words you live it every day. Dead end stare. Eyes transfixed. Focused on destruction of yourself
english.segment3: This could be the last time I wait for you. Take a while. Things only you can change. As you relive. As you relive. Stay a while. Things only you can change. As you revive. As you revive yourself
